title: I dropped my pixel 3a which cracked the screen and won't turn on but my alarms still go off. Help!
content:
I have tried holding down the power button for 5-7 seconds and 30 seconds and the screen never turns on. When I put my finger on the fingerprint scanner, it still vibrates and my alarms are still going off but the screen never turns on.
Because I dropped it and it broke a bit of the screen I'm not sure whether I can get it fixed on warranty.
Not sure what to do and no phone repair shops understand what's wrong with it or can fix it.
Thanks
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3a XL
